data.title: Gianluigi Buffon Biography
data.meta_description: Read all about Gianluigi Buffon with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Fast Facts

Joined Parma's youth squad at the age of 13

When his team, Parma, sold him to the Juventus squad in 2001, it was for a record 23

3-million lire

In 2011, established a European Championship Qualifying matches record by going 644 minutes without conceding a goal

In October 2013, became the record appearance holder for the Italian national squad

Was named goalkeeper of the 21st century and of the decade by the International Federation of Football History and Statistics

Has two sisters who played for the Italian National Volleyball team

His idol is legendary Cameroon goalkeeper Thomas N'Kono, and Buffon's first son's middle name is Thomas after N'Kono
